mapper.select: SELECT c.treat_no as treat_no , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , c6.com_code_name as pat_hsptlz_status , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name ,d.detail_no , r.recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c6 ON p.pat_hsptlz_status = c6.com_code AND c6.com_code_grp = 'HSPT' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' INNER JOIN tb_chart_detail d ON d.TREAT_NO = c.TREAT_NO WHERE c.clnic_sttus_code = 'PEND' OR c.clnic_sttus_code = 'NING'

SELECT P.PAT_CODE , P.PAT_NAME , P.PAT_TEL , P.PAT_IHIDNUM , to_char(to_date(PAT_BRTHDY),'yyyy-mm-dd') as PAT_BRTHDY, (SELECT C1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P1, TB_COMMON_CODE C1 WHERE P1.PAT_GEN_CODE = C1.COM_CODE AND P1.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE , P.PAT_ADDR , P.PAT_DTL_ADDR, P.PAT_ZIP, to_char(PAT_FIRST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_FIRST_DATE, to_char(PAT_LAST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_LAST_DATE , (SELECT C3.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P3, TB_COMMON_CODE C3 WHERE P3.PAT_FRGNR_YN = C3.COM_CODE AND P3.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C3.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO') AS PAT_FRGNR_YN , (SELECT C2.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P2, TB_COMMON_CODE C2 WHERE P2.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = C2.COM_CODE AND P2.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C2.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT') AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS FROM TB_PATIENT P WHERE PAT_CODE = #{patCode}

SELECT M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE, D.DETAIL_NO, P.PRSCRPTN_AMOUNT, P.PRSCRPTN_COUNT, P.PRSCRPTN_DAYS, P.PRSCRPTN_STATUS, P.PRSCRPTN_AMOUNT*P.PRSCRPTN_COUNT*P.PRSCRPTN_DAYS AS PRSCRPTN_TOTAL, M.MEDI_ITEM_NAME, M.NARCOTIC_YN, M.MEDI_ITEM_UNIT, L.MEDI_ITEM_INVR_QTY, L.MEDI_ITEM_LEAST_QTY FROM TB_PRESCRIPTION P INNER JOIN TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST M ON M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE = P.MEDI_ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_MEDI_ITEM_INVENTORY L ON L.MEDI_ITEM_CODE = M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL D ON D.DETAIL_NO = P.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC E ON E.TREAT_NO = D.TREAT_NO WHERE D.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND P.DETAIL_NO =#{detailNo}

SELECT CD.DETAIL_NO, T.TRE_CODE, T.TRE_CONTENT, TL.TRE_MEMO FROM TB_TREATMENT_LIST TL INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON CD.DETAIL_NO = TL.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_TREATMENT T ON T.TRE_CODE = TL.TRE_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO WHERE CD.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND CD.DETAIL_NO= #{detailNo}
mapper.update: update TB_CLINIC cl set cl.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'CEND' where cl.TREAT_NO =#{treatNo} and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL cd INNER JOIN TB_TREATMENT_LIST tl on cd.DETAIL_NO = tl.DETAIL_NO where cd.TREAT_NO = cl.TREAT_NO)
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DETAIL_REG_DATE_STR, P.MEDI_ITEM_CODE , M.MEDI_ITEM_NAME, P.PRSCRPTN_DAYS * P.PRSCRPTN_COUNT * P.PRSCRPTN_AMOUNT AS CALCULATED_VALUE FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTION P ON CD.DETAIL_NO = P.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST M ON P.MEDI_ITEM_CODE = M.MEDI_ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON CD.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON C.RCEPT_NO = R.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT PA ON R.PAT_CODE= PA.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE C1 ON C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = C1.COM_CODE AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE PA.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE ='REND'
mapper.update: update TB_CLINIC cl set cl.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'NING' where cl.TREAT_NO =#{treatNo} and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL cd INNER JOIN TB_TREATMENT_LIST tl on cd.DETAIL_NO = tl.DETAIL_NO where cd.TREAT_NO = cl.TREAT_NO)
